# Task 04 — Timeline elements (add + preview)

## Summary

Implement timeline media elements attached to timestamps: text, image/photo, link, emoji, and divider marker; provide preview UI.

## Requirements

- Each timestamp can have multiple elements.
- Elements render as a row of cards; width adapts to element count.
- Clicking element opens preview modal.
- A “+” card at the end opens add-element UI.

## Acceptance Criteria

- User can add text/link/divider at a timestamp and preview it.

## How to Test

- Manual: add multiple elements and verify rendering and preview.

## Dependencies

- phase-3/02-timeline-structure-and-sections.md

---
